metadata.title: CVE-2018-16468 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In the Loofah gem for Ruby, through v2.2.2, unsanitized JavaScript may occur in sanitized output when a crafted SVG element is republished.

criterions.comment: ruby-loofah package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.3-1').
